favourites.author: Jamie Gumbrecht, Michael Nedelman and Maggie Fox, CNN
favourites.title: Updated CDC guidelines now say people exposed to coronavirus may not need to be tested - CNN
favourites.description: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has changed its Covid-19 testing guidelines. The agency no longer recommends testing for most people without symptoms, even if they've been in close contact with someone known to have the virus.

favourites.author: NPR
favourites.title: Trump 2020 RNC Speech: Full Transcript And Fact Check - NPR
favourites.description: President Trump is accepting the Republican nomination for president on Thursday. NPR reporters are providing analysis of his remarks live.
favourites.content:
President Trump is accepting the Republican nomination for president on Thursday night.
Caroline Amenabar/NPR
